Starice::

Starice had strangle feeling with this baby, she know that babies 
needs care and a battle field the worse place to baby, she opened her 
comm link to Epyon "Sir.. you won't belive this, but I found a baby 
and.. with your permission sir I'll come back with her to Starjumper 
and I'll come back as soon I can... She's hungry and this isn't a 
safe place to her... I'll back sir... I'm sorry"

she took off in robot mode and flew quickly to Starjumper with the 
baby.

OOC: What's baby's name?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@h...> wrote:
> 
> BB: Nice to meet'cha Airshadow!
> 
> The kit's red fur, all fuzzy and new, was starting to get little 
dots of ash 
> on ot, moving along the ground on her tummy wasn't helping either 
but she 
> wasn't moving fast enough to kick up the ash on the ground.
> Making her own slide trail in it as she crawled.
> But since she was blind it wasn't long before she crawled up 
against the 
> base of a small tree with a thin trunk and caught on it. Bleating 
louder 
> because she couldm't move forward anymore and the ash made a small 
hill 
> behind her when she tried to back up.
> She was stuck there and ash was starting to fall from the tree and 
to her 
> nose and she was too young to know how to sneeze it off.
> Being a little tiny fox pup, it was hard to tell that she was a red 
now 
> because of all the soot in her fur.
> And she kept whining while she struggled to move her body to try 
and get 
> away from the trunk but she just didn't have enough controle over 
the 
> muscles to do anything.
> So she kept trying and failing until her feet suddeny left the 
ground after 
> some weird sound. (when Starice talked picked her up)Her tiny paws 
moving in 
> uncontroled spasms to try and get something solid under them.
> But it was only seconds before she could feel warmth (Starice's 
arms) and 
> her yipping gota bit softer before she snuggled into them, trying 
to find a 
> place to suckle like she would with her mother.
> Her nose was covered in ash so she couldn't tell if this warm thing 
was 
> mommy, so her brain just remembered the warmth and the thought of 
milk and 
> to suckle went right along with it.
> So she opened her tiny mouth and tried to suckle but there wasn't 
anything 
> to suckle from. It was just flat, so she moved in jerky little 
spasms to try 
> and see if there was a teet somewhere else that she missed.
> But there was nothing and she whined, her tummy feeling hunger 
pains.
> In Starice's arms she lifted her head up a bit and yupped, making 
the 
> faintest barks and then moving her head down against to bump her 
nose 
> against her arm but only because she couldn't see and was confused 
because 
> there was warmth and no milk to go with it.
> 
>
